basic.floral_language:
Muscari botryoides 'Baby's breath'
Floriography: vigorous, benevolent, confident
Muscari botryoides 'Baby's breath' has a short neat plant structure, plump inflorescence with flowers blooming from the bottom to the top, very glamorous, has elegant sweet smells with a calming effect. Often used to put beside the bed, creating a warm and comfortable environment for sleep.
Muscari botryoides 'Baby's breath' likes sunlight, spring is the full bloom season. Flowering for 3-4 weeks. After flowering, leave the bulbs to sprout in the coming year, normally can flower for years.
basic.blooming: Flowering period March-April, viewing period 3-4 weeks

maintenance.sunlight: Long-day plant, put in sunny places, but avoid strong sunlight at noon
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly only when soil is dry, in every 4-5 days
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove the withered parts on the ground after flowering, leaving bulbs for germination in the next year
